Container.Name: AudiobookCatalog
Container.Overview: An Unraid image to provide a UI for audiobooks hosted on a NAS

Variable.Description: Host URL, including Port, of the Loki instance to publish Loki logs
Variable.Name: LOKI_HOST

Variable.Description: Any labels to be added to all Loki log lines, formatted key1:value,key2:value
Variable.Name: LOKI_LABELS

Variable.Description: If Basic Auth is used in the Loki instance, the username to use in the request
Variable.Name: LOKI_USER

Variable.Description: If Basic Auth is used in the Loki instance, the password to use in the request
Variable.Name: LOKI_PASSWORD

Config.Name: Audiobooks Mount
Config.Description: Path to directory with audiobooks (audiobooks can be in subdirectories). Mounted to /audiobooks.

Config.Name: Import Mount
Config.Description: Path to directory for new books to be imported. Must not be the same or parent of Audiobooks Share. Mounted to /import.

Config.Name: Database Mount
Config.Description: Directory for sqlite3 database. File will be created if it does not exist. Directory must exist.

Config.Name: External Port
Config.Description: Port at which UI will be served
